house_17.description: Efficiently designed, this unit provides a cozy living space. The higher floor offers peace and quiet, with a reduced noise level from the surroundings.
house_17.potential_information_house: Being on the eleventh floor, it's away from the hustle and bustle of the street, but residents should be prepared for occasional elevator downtimes.

house_13.description: This house, though small, is laid out in a manner that optimizes the available space. The presence of a balcony is an added advantage for those who love a breath of fresh air.
house_13.potential_information_house: Its elevation means it is cooler during the summer months, but elevator maintenance can be an occasional inconvenience.

house_5.description: This unit showcases a spacious bedroom, a vast living area, and an efficiently designed kitchen. The bathroom is tailored for ease of use.
house_5.potential_information_house: Some windows might need sealing, as drafts can be felt during windy conditions.

house_15.description: A well-organized layout ensures that there's no feeling of being cramped, despite the compact size of the unit. The absence of a balcony means fewer distractions and more indoor space.
house_15.potential_information_house: Being on the ninth floor, this unit offers the quiet and serenity that comes with elevation, though it's slightly more affected by potential elevator issues.

house_11.description: Efficient design is the hallmark of this house. The space is cleverly utilized, offering a functional living area even without a dedicated bedroom.
house_11.potential_information_house: Located farther from the main road, it offers a quieter living experience but is slightly farther from the public transport stops.

house_22.description: A well-lit space with a separate kitchen and a balcony, offering a great balance between size and functionality.
house_22.potential_information_house: A prime pick for those who want both comfort and convenience.

house_30.description: Flooded with natural light, this unit offers a spacious bedroom, balcony, and a separate kitchen, making it a favorite among many.
house_30.potential_information_house: A slice of urban paradise for those who refuse to compromise on comfort.

house_23.description: Though compact, this unit is enhanced by its balcony and a separate kitchen, making it feel larger than it is.
house_23.potential_information_house: Offers a perfect blend of city living with homely comforts.

house_19.description: This compact space lacks natural light and doesn't have a distinct kitchen area. The bedroom size is adequate, ensuring a decent living space.
house_19.potential_information_house: Perfect for those looking to step out on their own and don't mind the absence of a balcony.

house_47.description: Showcasing a balanced design, this medium-sized apartment offers a spacious living room and a comforting bedroom. The inter-floor space is praiseworthy, guaranteeing tranquillity. The bathroom is spacious, and the kitchen is designed for ease of use.
house_47.potential_information_house: Infusing style with practicality, this house is tailored for modern lifestyles. The bedroom exudes calmness, ensuring rejuvenating sleep.

house_43.description: This home impresses with its expansive living quarters and a large bedroom. The inter-floor spacing is commendable, ensuring tranquillity. Both the bathroom and the separate kitchen are voluminous.
house_43.potential_information_house: This house is a testament to modern design, offering comfort at every turn. The bedroom's calm environment ensures uninterrupted sleep.

house_39.description: This house radiates charm with its efficient layout, providing ample living space and a generously proportioned bedroom. The inter-floor space is airy, and both the bathroom and separate kitchen are expansive.
house_39.potential_information_house: Marrying design with functionality, this house offers a perfect setting for modern lifestyles. The bedroom provides a serene escape, ensuring restful nights.

house_52.description: With a harmonious layout, this apartment offers a lively living space and a soothing bedroom. The ample inter-floor height guarantees a tranquil setting. The bathroom is equipped for relaxation, and the kitchen is functional.
house_52.potential_information_house: Crafted for modern dwellers, this house exudes elegance in its design. The bedroom's quiet environment ensures a refreshing retreat.

house_35.description: With a well-thought-out floor plan, this property offers a large bedroom. The roomy inter-floor space guarantees noise insulation, and the commodious bathroom ensures a seamless bathing experience. The distinct kitchen is spacious.
house_35.potential_information_house: The house stands out due to its modern design. Its efficient layout caters to contemporary lifestyles. The surrounding environment resonates tranquillity.

house_51.description: Designed with precision, this apartment offers a well-lit living area and a restful bedroom. The generous inter-floor space ensures a peaceful ambiance. The bathroom is tastefully designed, and the kitchen space is optimized.
house_51.potential_information_house: Merging style with utility, this house is perfect for those valuing modern living. The bedroom ambiance is calm, promoting restful sleep.

house_70.description: The house offers a compact yet efficient layout. Though the bedroom size might be a tad smaller, it ensures a cozy ambiance. The bathroom, designed for quick showers, maximizes space utility. The absence of a separate kitchen might be noticeable, but the available kitchen space is well-organized.
house_70.potential_information_house: The charm of the house might be overshadowed by its age, leading to potential maintenance needs. However, its prime location and view can be a great attraction.

house_72.description: The house features a layout perfect for singles or couples. The bedroom, though on the smaller side, promises comfort. The wash area, tailored for quick showers, ensures easy movement. The kitchen space is combined but is adequately equipped.
house_72.potential_information_house: The vintage aura of the house is appealing, but certain areas might hint at wear and tear. Nevertheless, its location and amenities can be compelling for potential renters.

house_71.description: This unit optimizes space with its clever layout. The bedroom might seem snug, but it provides a warm atmosphere. The bathroom is tailored for swift showers and maximizes space. The integrated kitchen space, although not separate, is functional.
house_71.potential_information_house: While the house exudes a nostalgic vibe, some parts might require refurbishments. But its accessibility and scenic view might outweigh the cons.

house_69.description: This unit offers an optimized layout ensuring all spaces, including the bedroom, are comfortable. The bathroom layout facilitates smooth routines, and the kitchen, though snug, remains functional.
house_69.potential_information_house: The house carries a modern design, but potential tenants might want to check the balcony doors for better sound insulation.

house_64.description: The house benefits from an effective use of space, ensuring all rooms are comfortably sized. The bathroom is ergonomically designed for easy usage, and a separate, modest-sized kitchen is available for culinary needs.
house_64.potential_information_house: Though the house is beautifully laid out, potential residents might want to check the insulation during peak seasons.

house_62.description: The property is designed with a well-proportioned layout that maximizes space. The bedroom is adequately sized for comfort, and the bathroom ensures an easy shower experience. The standalone kitchen, while not vast, is functional and meets everyday cooking needs.
house_62.potential_information_house: While the house has a charming layout, potential tenants might want to check the water pressure, which could vary.

house_91.description: This compact layout is ideal for singles or young couples. The bedroom is decent in size, ensuring comfortable living. The kitchen, although not separate, offers ample space for cooking. The bathroom layout ensures easy and comfortable showers.
house_91.potential_information_house: The house has old-fashioned wooden fittings that add a touch of nostalgia. However, one might feel the absence of a spacious living area.

house_79.description: Featuring an impressive layout, the house ensures that every corner is usable. The vertical spacing between the floors is manageable, but the highlight remains the voluminous bedroom. The house comes without a separate kitchen, but the existing space is expansive.
house_79.potential_information_house: Some residents have mentioned the unique architectural design of the living room, which adds to the house's charm.

house_88.description: This house embodies a minimalist design, prioritizing function over extravagance. Floor spacing is a tad tight, but the bedroom feels spacious. The absence of a separate kitchen is made up by a well-designed bathroom.
house_88.potential_information_house: The insulation isn't top-notch, so it might get a bit chilly during winters.

house_96.description: The unit resonates with a vibe of simplicity and elegance. The open kitchen concept ensures that the space feels airy, and the bathroom has been designed for comfort.
house_96.potential_information_house: The close proximity of neighboring units might slightly hamper privacy, but the interiors are thoughtfully designed.

house_94.description: This house offers a blend of comfort and functionality. The kitchen and dining area flow seamlessly, making it great for solo residents or couples. The bathroom is streamlined for ease of use.
house_94.potential_information_house: Potential tenants might find the living area a bit restrictive, but the bedroom compensates with its spaciousness.

house_82.description: The well-thought-out layout of this house maximizes utility and space. The floor spacing might be a tad constrictive, but it's balanced by a vast bedroom. The house doesn't feature a distinct kitchen, but the current provision is ample.
house_82.potential_information_house: Previous tenants have appreciated the unobstructed views from the windows, which add to the appeal of the property.

house_92.description: Designed for minimalistic living, this house has a roomy bedroom but lacks a vast living area. The available kitchen space is sufficient for day-to-day cooking, and the bathroom is ergonomically designed.
house_92.potential_information_house: The bedroom window offers a limited view due to adjacent buildings, but the interior lighting compensates adequately.
